appendix.title: Licenses for Distribution of Swarm and Applications

important.title: Distribution Terms

formalpara.title: Swarm libraries
formalpara.para: Swarm is distributed under the GNU Library General Public License (LGPL).

formalpara.title: Swarm example applications and documentation
formalpara.para: The Swarm example applications and the Swarm documentation are distributed under the GNU General Public License (GPL).

important.para: More information on these GNU LGPL and GPL, and free software in general, please consult the Free Software Foundation.
